name: First Person Shooter Test1
description:
This is a First Person Shooter (FPS) game.
Double-Jump (press spacebar twice)
Sprint (hold ctrl button)
Teleport (press middle mouse button, while moving)

Use W,A,S,D to move.
Press SpaceBar to jump.
Hold mouse Left Click to shoot.

Press P to pause the game at any time.
And don't fall in the void...

Enjoy this test game!
